name: blazex-astro
title: BlazeX Astro
desc: Blazex Astro is a high performance saas theme for startups with sleek design, fast load times and easy customization
article:
Key Features:

  • 13 Complete SaaS Pages
  • 100/100 Google PageSpeed Score on Desktop
  • Highly customizable (Color, Font, Menu, Social Links, SEO Meta Tags, etc.)
  • Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4
  • Netlify & Vercel setting pre-configured
  • Write and update content in Markdown / MDX
  • MDX components auto-import
  • Fully responsive on desktops, tablets, and smartphones 1Â 
  • Clean folder structure
  • Simple and easy development environment setup
  • Compatible with all modern browsers
  • SEO Friendly
  • Animation on scroll
  • Free Google fonts
  • Lifetime free updates
  • Detail Documentation

Unique Pages:

  1. Home
  2. Case Studies
  3. Blog
  4. Blog Single
  5. Features
  6. Integration
  7. Changelog
  8. Terms
  9. Privacy
  10. 404
  11. Pricing
  12. Contact
  13. About
